scripts.install:all: cd vscode-extension && npm install && cd ../angular-extension && npm run install:all && cd ../react-extension && npm run install:all && cd ../custom-theme && npm install && cd ../theia && npm install
scripts.build:all:browser: cd vscode-extension && npm run theia:prepare-app && cd ../angular-extension && npm run theia:prepare-app && cd ../react-extension && npm run theia:prepare-app && cd ../custom-theme && npm run theia:prepare-app && cd ../theia && npm run build:browser
